column1: The Pit Room////Best bbq I've had in years. Creative and simply put perfect.. I a bbq snob and native Texan. I picked the pit room out of convenience as I wanted something on my way out of town.  Parking was good
column2: and staff very friendly helpful.  Place is clean.  The food is exceptional! Not just the meat
column3: everything is first class prepared and most of it has some of its own uniqueness.. like real bbq should!!  Now I always come by when I'm in town.
